alert.note: Alert for Nelson; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 4:43AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nelson and northwestern Washington Counties through 515 AM EST... At 443 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bardstown, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Washington and northeastern Nelson Counties, including the following locations... East Bardstown, Bloomfield, Samuels Field Airport, Booker, Maud, Bellwood, Botland, Mooresville, Withrow and Croakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for central Kentucky.
